34#ifndef _PLOG_H
35#define _PLOG_H
36
37#ifdef HAVE_STDARG_H
38#include <stdarg.h>
39#else
40#include <varargs.h>
41#endif
42#include <syslog.h>
43
44/*
45 * INFO: begin negotiation, SA establishment/deletion/expiration.
46 * NOTIFY: just notifiable.
47 * WARNING: not error strictly.
48 * ERROR: system call error. also invalid parameter/format.
49 * DEBUG1: debugging informatioin.
50 * DEBUG2: too more verbose. e.g. parsing config.
51 */
52#define LLV_ERROR 1
53#define LLV_WARNING 2
54#define LLV_NOTIFY 3
55#define LLV_INFO 4
56#define LLV_DEBUG 5
57#define LLV_DEBUG2 6
58
59#define LLV_BASE LLV_INFO /* by default log less than this value. */
60
61extern char *pname;
62extern u_int32_t loglevel;
63extern int f_foreground;
64extern int print_location;
65
66struct sockaddr;
67#define plog(pri, ...) \
68 do { \
69 if ((pri) <= loglevel) \
70 _plog((pri), __VA_ARGS__); \
71 } while (0)
72extern void _plog __P((int, const char *, struct sockaddr *, const char *, ...))
73 __attribute__ ((__format__ (__printf__, 4, 5)));
74extern void plogv __P((int, const char *, struct sockaddr *,
75 const char *, va_list));
76extern void plogdump __P((int, void *, size_t));
77extern void ploginit __P((void));
78extern void plogset __P((char *));
79
80extern char* binsanitize __P((char*, size_t));
81
82#endif /* _PLOG_H */
83
